Title: Baked Apple French Toast Casserole
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '4 eggs, beaten', '½ cup half-and-half', '½ cup milk', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 (8 ounce) loaf French bread, cut into small cubes', '¼ cup butter', '3 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and cut into small dice', '¼ cup brown sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Prepare a 7x11-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Beat eggs, half-and-half, milk, white sugar, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl; add bread cubes and stir to coat.
', 'Step 4: Let soak until bread is moist, at least 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir apples and brown sugar into the melted butter to moisten the sugar completely; add cinnamon and cook, stirring regularly, until the apples are warmed yet still firm, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir apple mixture into the bread mixture; pour into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Bake in preheated oven until golden on top and still somewhat soft in the center, 35 to 45 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '342.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '43.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '153.4 mg', 'fatContent': '14.4 g', 'fiberContent': '2.4 g', 'proteinContent': '10.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '367.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '20.6 g'}

Title: Duck Confit
Ingredients: ['2 uncooked Peking duck legs', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 lemon, zested and thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon whole allspice berries', '1 tablespoon juniper berries', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 cups rendered duck fat']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season the duck legs with kosher salt on both sides.
', 'Step 2: Place them in a large resealable bag.
', 'Step 3: Add the lemon zest and slices, garlic, allspice berries, juniper berries and fresh thyme.
', 'Step 4: Seal, and massage the duck legs through the bag until all of the ingredients are evenly dispersed.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate for 24 hours to marinate.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (93 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Remove the duck legs from the marinade.
', 'Step 8: Rinse them off and pat dry.
', 'Step 9: Place the rest of the contents of the bag into the bottom of an oven safe dish just large enough to hold the legs in a single layer, preferably enameled cast iron or glass.
', 'Step 10: Arrange the duck legs skin side down in the dish.
', 'Step 11: Pour the duck fat into a small saucepan and warm over low heat until liquid.
', 'Step 12: Pour over the duck legs until they are completely covered.
', 'Step 13: If the legs are not covered, you can top it off with some olive oil.
', 'Step 14: As the legs cook, more fat will be rendered from the skin.
', 'Step 15: Cover the dish with a lid.
', 'Step 16: Bake for 6 to 7 hours in the preheated oven, until the meat pulls easily from the bone.
', 'Step 17: Remove the duck legs from the fat and place in a sealable container.
', 'Step 18: You may leave the bones in or remove them.
', 'Step 19: Make sure there is room at the top of the container.
', 'Step 20: Strain all of the solids from the remaining fat and discard the solids.
', 'Step 21: Pour the fat over the duck in the container, covering completely.
', 'Step 22: Seal and allow to come to room temperature.
', 'Step 23: Once the jar is cool, place in the refrigerator and let the duck meat cure for 2 months.
', 'Step 24: Reserve any leftover duck fat for other uses.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '2520.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '9.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '330.4 mg', 'fatContent': '270.5 g', 'fiberContent': '5.3 g', 'proteinContent': '20.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '90 g', 'sodiumContent': '2988.7 mg'}

Title: Madame Cristo - Grilled Ham and Cheese
Ingredients: ['2 large eggs', '½ cup heavy cream', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', '1 teaspoon freshly grated lemon zest', '4 slices white bread', '8 thin slices Havarti cheese', '4 ounces thinly sliced honey baked ham, halved', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ teaspoon champagne vinegar', '2 eggs', '1 pinch cayenne pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine egg, heavy cream or milk, salt, cayenne pepper, nutmeg, and lemon zest in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix until batter is thin and runny.
', 'Step 3: (Add 2 tablespoons more milk or cream if needed.
', 'Step 4: ) Toast bread until lightly browned.
', 'Step 5: Add Havarti cheese to each slice.
', 'Step 6: Divide ham between two sandwiches.
', 'Step 7: Bring the two halves of the sandwich together and place into the batter.
', 'Step 8: Flip several times to coat evenly; place on a plate.
', 'Step 9: Repeat with second sandwich.
', 'Step 10: Fill a large saucepan with 2 inches of water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 11: In the meantime, melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Cook sandwiches in the hot butter until outside is browned and cheese is melted, about 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, reduce saucepan heat to medium-low, pour in vinegar, and keep the water at a gentle simmer.
', 'Step 14: Crack an egg into a small bowl, then gently slip it into the simmering water, holding the bowl just above the surface of water.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with second egg.
', 'Step 16: Cook until the egg white is firm and the yolk has thickened but is not hard, 2 1/2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Transfer sandwiches to plates and dust with cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 18: Remove the eggs from the water with a slotted spoon, dab on a kitchen towel to remove excess water, and place onto each sandwich.
', 'Step 19: Dust with cayenne pepper.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '903.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '31.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '565.7 mg', 'fatContent': '69.8 g', 'fiberContent': '1.5 g', 'proteinContent': '39.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '39.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '2135.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.1 g'}

Title: The French Bread
Ingredients: ['2 cups sourdough starter', '10 tablespoons water', '1 ½ teaspoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '4 cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed', '2 teaspoons cornmeal', '2 cups boiling water', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon milk']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the sourdough starter, water, olive oil, salt, sugar, yeast, and flour in that order into the pan of a bread machine, set the machine on the dough cycle, and start the machine.
', 'Step 2: After the machine has finished its cycle, turn the dough out onto a floured surface, and knead several times; mix in more flour if the dough is very sticky.
', 'Step 3: Cut the dough in half, and roll each piece of dough out into a rectangle about 8 by 12 inches and 1/2-inch thick.
', 'Step 4: Roll the rectangles into loaves the long way, pinch the seams, and taper and pinch the ends of the loaves.
', 'Step 5: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper, and sprinkle paper with cornmeal.
', 'Step 6: Place the loaves gently onto the prepared baking sheets, cover loosely with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Place a large baking stone onto the center rack of oven, and place a baking dish onto a lower rack.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Carefully pour boiling water into the baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Remove plastic wrap from loaves, and slash several 1/2-inch deep cuts into each loaf with a sharp knife.
', 'Step 11: Whisk egg yolk and milk together in a small bowl until thoroughly mixed, and brush the loaves with the egg yolk mixture.
', 'Step 12: Place the loaves into the preheated oven on top of the baking stone, and quickly spray the inside of the oven 4 or 5 times with a water-filled spray bottle.
', 'Step 13: Shut oven door; wait 1 minute, and spray again; repeat twice more, spraying the oven 4 times with water at 1-minute intervals.
', 'Step 14: Bake about 15 minutes, and remove the water-filled baking dish.
', 'Step 15: Continue to bake until the bread is browned and the loaves make a hollow sound when thumped, about 15 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove bread to cool on racks.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '172.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '34 g', 'cholesterolContent': '13.1 mg', 'fatContent': '1.3 g', 'fiberContent': '1.7 g', 'proteinContent': '5.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '155.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.6 g'}

Title: French Coconut Pie
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups white sugar', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '6 eggs', '1 cup buttermilk', '½ cup margarine, melted', '1 cup flaked coconut', '1 cup chopped pecans', '2 prepared 8 inch pastry shells']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a small bowl, mix together the sugar and flour.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, mix the eggs with a wire whisk.
', 'Step 4: Whisk flour mixture into eggs, until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Stir in buttermilk, margarine, coconut and pecans.
', 'Step 6: Pour into unbaked pie crusts.
', 'Step 7: Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 8: If making a 9 inch deep dish pie, bake for 1 hour.
']

Title: Pork Normandy
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 ½ pounds pork tenderloin', '1 medium onion, thinly sliced', '1 large sweet apple - peeled, cored and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '5 ounces chicken stock', '⅓ (12 fluid ounce) bottle hard apple cider', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons heavy cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat butter in an oven-proof skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Place pork tenderloin in butter, and brown on both sides.
', 'Step 4: Remove from skillet, and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Stir in onions, and cook 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in apple, and cook until golden brown.
', 'Step 7: Stir in flour; cook about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 8: In a bowl, stir together stock and apple cider.
', 'Step 9: Stir into skillet, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Return tenderloin to skillet.
', 'Step 11: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 12: Cover skillet.
', 'Step 13: Bake in preheated oven until tender, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove tenderloin to a cutting board, and cut into 1 1/2-inch slices.
', 'Step 15: Pour the sauce, including the onions and apples, into a blender or food processor and pulse until smooth.
', 'Step 16: Return the sauce to the pan, and reheat over medium-low; stir in 2 tablespoons cream, and heat until warm.
', 'Step 17: Serve sauce spooned over sliced tenderloin.
']

Title: French Cookies (Belgi Galettes)
Ingredients: ['2 pounds dark brown sugar', '1 pound butter', '7 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '6 ½ cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, stir together the brown sugar and butter until smooth and creamy; then add eggs and vanilla, and beat well.
', 'Step 2: Gradually stir in flour.
', 'Step 3: Set bowl over a hot water bath, and stir to blend ingredients.
', 'Step 4: Cover, and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the galette iron.
', 'Step 6: Shape dough into 1 inch balls, and place in the galette iron.
', 'Step 7: Close the iron, and cook the cookies.
', 'Step 8: This should take about 30 seconds in an electric galette iron, or 2 to 4 minutes in a handheld iron over a medium flame.
', 'Step 9: Carefully remove cookies and cool on wire racks.
']

Title: Chicken Gruyere with Sauteed Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon dried dill weed', '¼ cup butter, divided', '4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves', '1 pound fresh mushrooms', '1 onion, sliced into rings', '½ cup white wine', '8 ounces Gruyere cheese, shredded']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a shallow dish, stir together the flour, salt, pepper, parsley, and dill.
', 'Step 3: Rinse chicken breasts, and pat dry.
', 'Step 4: Dredge chicken in the flour mixture.
', 'Step 5: In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the butter over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Place chicken into the hot buttered skillet, and fry until brown on both sides.
', 'Step 7: Transfer chicken breasts to a 1 quart glass baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Add remaining butter to skillet, and fry the mushrooms and onion until wilted and lightly browned.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the white wine, and reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 10: Simmer for 3 minutes to blend flavors.
', 'Step 11: Pour the mushroom mixture over the chicken in the dish.
', 'Step 12: Cover dish, and bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 13: After 20 minutes, remove cover, and sprinkle with shredded cheese.
', 'Step 14: Continue baking for 10 more minutes, or until cheese is lightly browned and bubbly.
']

Title: Chestnut Soup
Ingredients: ['8 cups chicken stock', '1 ½ pounds chestnuts, peeled', '1 cup chopped onion', '3 sprigs fresh parsley', '2 whole cloves', '1 bay leaf', '½ cup heavy cream', '¾ teaspoon white sugar', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: To Cook Chestnuts: With a sharp knife, slice an 'X' across each chestnut.
", 'Step 2: Place chestnuts in a single layer on a jelly roll pan.
', 'Step 3: Pour 1/4 cup water into the pan.
', 'Step 4: Bake in a preheated 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) oven for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: When cool enough to handle, shell and peel.
', 'Step 6: In a large saucepan combine the chicken stock, shelled chestnuts and chopped onions.
', 'Step 7: Place the parsley sprigs, cloves and bay leaf in a spice bag and add to the chicken stock mixture.
', 'Step 8: Simmer over medium-low heat for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Discard the spice bag and puree the chestnut mixture in a food processor or blender.
', 'Step 10: Add the heavy cream, sugar and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 11: Return mixture to saucepan and gently heat through.
', 'Step 12: To serve to with a dollop of unsweetened whipped cream, a bit of chopped parsley and some cooked chopped chestnuts just before serving.
', 'Step 13: High quality vegetable broth can be substituted for the chicken broth.
']

Title: French Potato Salad
Ingredients: ['9 potatoes', '½ cup vegetable oil', '¼ cup tarragon vinegar', '¼ cup beef consomme', '¼ cup chopped green onions', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add potatoes; cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, and transfer to a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Cool slightly.
', 'Step 5: Peel and slice into a large bowl.
', 'Step 6: In a small bowl, combine oil, vinegar, consomme, green onion, parsley, and salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Gently toss warm potatoes with dressing.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
']

Title: Thai-Style Ground Pork Skewers
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ground pork', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 tablespoon water', 'wooden skewers, soaked in water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine pork, sugar, fish sauce, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix together thoroughly.
', 'Step 3: Dissolve baking powder in 1 tablespoon water and blend completely into the pork mixture.
', 'Step 4: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 6: Thread a handful of the pork mixture through a skewer using lightly oiled hands.
', 'Step 7: Shape meat into a 1-inch-thick sausage around the skewer.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with the remaining pork and skewers.
', 'Step 9: Grill skewers, turning as needed, until browned on all sides and no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Cut each sausage into bite-sized pieces before serving.
']

Title: Blackberry Clafoutis
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon butter, or as needed', '1 (6 ounce) container fresh blackberries, or more to taste', '⅞ cup milk', '2 eggs', '¾ cup all-purpose flour', '7 tablespoons white sugar', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon brown sugar, or more to taste']

Title: Peach Gelee Candy
Ingredients: ['1 pound ripe peaches - peeled, pitted and sliced', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '2 cups white sugar, divided', '3 tablespoons liquid pectin', '½ cup white sugar, for sprinkling']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line an 8x8-inch baking dish with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 2: Combine peaches and lime juice in a blender.
', 'Step 3: Puree until very smooth.
', 'Step 4: Pour into a saucepan over medium heat, stir in 1/2 cup sugar, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring continuously, until thickened, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar and pectin.
', 'Step 7: Using a thermometer, heat to 205 degrees F (96 degrees C) and cook, stirring continuously, for another 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 9: Pour peach puree into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Shake gently and tap on the countertop to remove any air bubbles.
', 'Step 11: Cover and refrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle about half the 1/2 cup of sugar over a silicone baking mat and invert the peach gelee on top.
', 'Step 13: Remove plastic wrap and sprinkle top with sugar.
', 'Step 14: Trim off any uneven edges and cut gelee into 25 squares.
']

Title: Seafood Omelets with Creamy Cheese Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup chicken broth', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '¼ cup heavy cream', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 (6 ounce) can crab', '1 (6 ounce) can salad shrimp', '¼ cup heavy cream', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 dash nutmeg', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '4 eggs, beaten', '¼ cup heavy cream', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Prepare the filling by stirring Dijon mustard into chicken broth in a saucepan until dissolved.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, then add 1/4 cup cream and 2 tablespoons butter.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to medium, and simmer until reduced by half, then stir in crab and shrimp; keep warm over low heat.
', 'Step 4: Prepare the sauce by warming 1/4 cup cream, and 1 teaspoon mustard over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Once hot, whisk in the shredded cheese, then season to taste with nutmeg, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Keep warm over low heat.
', 'Step 7: Whisk eggs, 1/4 cup cream, salt, and pepper together until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Heat an 8-inch non-stick skillet over medium heat, and lightly oil with cooking spray.
', 'Step 9: Pour 1/4 cup of the egg mixture into hot pan, and swirl to make a thin, even layer of egg.
', 'Step 10: Cook until firmed, then flip and cook for a few seconds more to firm the other side.
', 'Step 11: To prepare omelets, spoon some of the seafood filling into the lower half of each omelet.
', 'Step 12: Roll up into a cylinder.
', 'Step 13: Serve 2 per person bathed with Cheddar sauce.
']

Title: Plum Clafouti
Ingredients: ['6 tablespoons white sugar, divided', '14 Italian prune plums, halved and pitted', '3 eggs', '1 ⅓ cups milk', '⅔ cup all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons grated lemon zest', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1 pinch salt', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar"]

', 'Step 4: Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of sugar over the top of the plums.

', 'Step 8: Bake for 50 to 60 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm and lightly browned.
', 'Step 9: Let stand 5 minutes before slicing.
', "Step 10: Dust with confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]

Title: Chocolate Liqueur Souffles
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter, for ramekins', 'white sugar for dusting', '2 teaspoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '¼ cup white sugar, divided', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons bread flour', '¾ cup milk', '4 egg yolks', '4 egg whites', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup chocolate liqueur', '2 tablespoons semisweet chocolate chips, melted', '½ cup fresh raspberries for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Thoroughly grease the the bottom and sides of four ramekins with the tablespoon of butter.
', 'Step 3: Coat with sugar, tipping out any excess.
', 'Step 4: If desired, place a raspberry and a drizzle of chocolate as a "surprise" at the bottom of each cup.
', 'Step 5: Combine the cocoa powder, cornstarch, and a tablespoon of the sugar; set aside.
', 'Step 6: Mix the butter and flour to form a paste.
', 'Step 7: Lightly whisk one egg yolk in a heatproof bowl.
', 'Step 8: Heat the milk to the boiling point in a heavy saucepan; whisk in the flour-butter mixture until it melts.
', 'Step 9: Gradually pour the hot milk into the egg yolk in a steady stream, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 10: Return the mixture to the saucepan and bring the custard to a simmer over low heat, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon or spatula.
', 'Step 11: Cook and stir the custard until it thickens, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Remove from the heat, stirring occasionally to keep it smooth.
', 'Step 13: Combine the three remaining egg yolks with the vanilla, liqueur, and the sugar-cocoa-cornstarch mixture.
', 'Step 14: Whisk in the warm custard, cover, and set aside.
', 'Step 15: (The custard can be made ahead of time up to this point and refrigerated for a day before proceeding with the recipe.
', 'Step 16: ) About 35 minutes before serving, whip the egg whites until they are thick and foamy and have quadrupled in volume.
', 'Step 17: Gradually mix in the remaining 3 tablespoons of the sugar, whipping until the egg whites are stiff but not dry.
', 'Step 18: Fold 1/3 of the meringue into the custard to lighten it, using a whisk or rubber spatula.
', 'Step 19: Fold in the remaining meringue.
', 'Step 20: Immediately transfer the souffle batter into the prepared ramekins, making a smooth mound slightly above the rim of each ramekin.
', 'Step 21: (If you have a piping bag, you may pipe the mixture into the ramekins.
', 'Step 22: ) Bake at once in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the souffles have risen and the edges are set.
', 'Step 23: Serve hot, with raspberry sauce and fresh raspberries to garnish, if desired.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '371.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '42.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '231.4 mg', 'fatContent': '15.9 g', 'fiberContent': '1.8 g', 'proteinContent': '8.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '146 mg', 'sugarContent': '32.1 g'}

Title: Coq Au Vin with Rosemary and Thyme
Ingredients: ['½ pound bacon, chopped', '6 chicken thighs, or more to taste', '2 shallots, chopped', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon minced garlic, or more to taste', '2 cups dry white wine', '1 cup sliced mushrooms, or to taste', '1 cup chicken stock, or more as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Transfer bacon to a paper towel-lined plate, reserving bacon grease in skillet.
', 'Step 3: Place chicken thighs in the bacon grease and cook until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Add shallots, thyme, rosemary, and garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle bacon over chicken mixture and pour in wine; simmer until wine is slightly reduced, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add mushrooms and enough chicken stock to almost cover chicken.
', 'Step 7: Cover skillet and simmer for 35 minutes; taste broth and adjust seasoning.
', 'Step 8: Simmer until chicken is no longer pink near the bone, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 9: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; stir in flour and cook until a thick paste forms, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Whisk paste into chicken mixture until sauce is thickened, 1 to 2 minutes.
']

Title: Best French Macarons
Ingredients: ["1 ¾ cups confectioners' sugar", '1 cup blanched almond flour', '1 teaspoon salt, divided', '¼ teaspoon cream of tartar', '3 egg whites, room temperature', '¼ cup superfine sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 drops gel food coloring', '1 cup unsalted butter, softened', "3 cups confectioners' sugar", '3 tablespoons heavy cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Combine confectioners' sugar, almond flour, and 1/2 teaspoon salt in the bowl of a food processor.
", 'Step 2: Pulse a few times until extra-fine.
', 'Step 3: Sift through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Beat egg whites with the remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt and cream of tartar in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment until frothy.
', 'Step 5: Gradually add superfine sugar and vanilla and continue to beat on medium speed until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 6: Do not overbeat; tips of peaks should hold their shape but curl over slightly.
', 'Step 7: Gently fold 1/3 of the almond flour mixture into the egg whites, turning bowl occasionally, until nearly combined.
', 'Step 8: Drop in food coloring.
', 'Step 9: Add remaining almond flour mixture in 2 additions, gently folding until a batter comes together.
', 'Step 10: Batter should fall off the spatula in thick ribbons without breaking.
', 'Step 11: Transfer batter to a piping bag with a #804 pastry tip.
', 'Step 12: Line 2 light-colored baking sheets with silicone macaron mats.
', 'Step 13: Pipe batter into each circle on the mats.
', 'Step 14: Tap baking sheets 4 times against the counter to release any air bubbles.
', 'Step 15: Let macarons sit at room temperature until dry to the touch, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 16: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', "Step 17: Bake macarons in the preheated oven until bottoms rise slightly off the mats to form 'feet', 17 to 20 minutes.
", 'Step 18: Switch baking sheets positions halfway through.
', 'Step 19: Let macarons cool on the mats for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely, at least 15 minutes.
', "Step 21: Meanwhile, beat butter and confectioners' sugar together using an electric mixer until creamy.
", 'Step 22: Add heavy cream and vanilla extract; beat until combined.
', 'Step 23: Transfer buttercream to a piping bag with a #4 pastry tip.
', 'Step 24: Pipe buttercream onto 1/2 of the macarons.
', 'Step 25: Top with the other halves to create sandwiches.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '103.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '13.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '11.4 mg', 'fatContent': '5.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '0.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '52.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.8 g'}

Title: French Beef Stew
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds cubed beef stew meat', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 (14 ounce) can beef broth', '4 carrots, chopped', '2 potatoes, peeled and chopped', '¾ teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons Dijon-style prepared mustard', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine meat and flour in a large plastic food storage bag and toss to coat evenly.
', 'Step 2: In a 6 quart saucepan brown meat in hot vegetable oil.
', 'Step 3: Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
', 'Step 4: Add diced tomatoes, beef broth, carrots, potatoes and thyme.
', 'Step 5: Bring to boil; reduce heat to medium-low, cover; and simmer for 1 hour or until beef is tender.
', 'Step 6: Blend in mustard and serve.
']

Title: Southern Style French Onion Soup
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, sliced', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '5 (10.5 ounce) cans beef consomme', '6 bay leaves', '½ cup white wine', '1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium high heat.
', 'Step 3: Place the onion in the butter and saute for 5 to 10 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the thyme and remove from heat.
', 'Step 5: In a large pot over high heat, combine the consomme, bay leaves and white wine, if desired.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, stir in the sauteed onions and allow to heat through, about 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Ladle soup into 4 individual oven-safe bowls, filling each about 3/4 of the way.
', 'Step 8: Top each bowl with 2 slices of baguette bread and then cover each with the cheese.
', 'Step 9: Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 15 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
']

Title: Classic Infused Creme Brulee
Ingredients: ['½ cup whole milk', '1 ½ cups heavy whipping cream', '⅔ cup white sugar', '1 pinch salt', '1 whole vanilla bean, split lengthwise and scraped', '6 large egg yolks', '¼ cup white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place an oven rack slightly lower than center in oven and preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Whisk milk, cream, 2/3 cup sugar, salt, scrapings from vanilla bean, and split vanilla bean in a saucepan over medium heat until the mixture just reaches a boil; remove from heat and set aside to cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Whisk egg yolks in a bowl for a few strokes; whisk in hot cream mixture about 1 tablespoon at a time at first, whisking thoroughly before adding the next amount.
', 'Step 4: As the yolk mixture becomes warmer, increase the amount of cream mixture you whisk in to about 1/4 cup at a time.
', 'Step 5: Strain the cream through a fine sieve and spoon into eight 4-ounce ramekins.
', 'Step 6: Discard spent vanilla pod.
', 'Step 7: Set the ramekins into a roasting pan and pour in enough hot water to reach halfway up the sides of the ramekins.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until the desserts are softly set, 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove the roasting pan and let the desserts cool in the water bath to room temperature.
', 'Step 10: Chill in refrigerator at least 2 hours.
', 'Step 11: Desserts will hold for 2 to 3 days in refrigerator before topping with sugar.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle about 1/2 tablespoon of sugar evenly over the top of each dessert.
', 'Step 13: Use a kitchen torch to lightly brown and caramelize the sugar until melted, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Move the torch quickly to avoid burning.
', 'Step 15: Let caramelized topping cool for about 10 minutes, then serve.
']

', 'Step 2: Season chicken tenders with salt and pepper, and saute them in butter until golden on all sides, about 10 minutes.

']

', "Step 2: Heat 1/2 cup cream in a small saucepan over medium-high heat until it begins to rise and foam, watching carefully so it doesn't spill over, 3 to 5 minutes.

Title: Filet Mignon with Mushroom-Cabernet Gravy
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 (8 ounce) (1 inch thick) filet mignon steaks', '½ teaspoon sea salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large shallot, chopped', '12 ounces sliced fresh white mushrooms', '1 cup Cabernet Sauvignon or other dry red wine', '½ cup beef broth', '1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon cornstarch', '2 tablespoons water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle the filets with salt and pepper, gently place them into the hot skillet, and sear until well-browned on each side, about 2 minutes per side.

', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the shallot and mushrooms in the butter until the mushrooms begin to give off their liquid and the shallots are translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the wine, beef broth, and thyme, and simmer the sauce until it begins to reduce, 6 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Return the steaks to the sauce, and simmer briefly until they start to become firm and are reddish-pink and juicy in the center, about 2 to 4 minutes per side (for medium-rare.
', 'Step 8: ) An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 130 degrees F (54 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Remove the steaks to serving dishes.
', 'Step 10: In a small bowl, stir the cornstarch and water until it forms a smooth paste.
', 'Step 11: Stir the cornstarch mixture into the pan sauce, and cook and stir until thickened, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 12: Top each serving with mushroom-wine sauce to serve.
']

Title: Raspberry Pain au Chocolat (Raspberry Chocolate Croissants)
Ingredients: ['1 (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed', '6 tablespoons chocolate hazelnut spread', '3 tablespoons all fruit raspberry jam', '1 egg, beaten', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Unfold the puff pastry sheets on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 3: Cut each one into thirds along the fold lines.
', 'Step 4: Roll each strip of dough out to about 16 inches long, and cut strips into thirds.
', 'Step 5: Spread some of the hazelnut spread onto one half of each rectangle to within 1/2 inch of the edge.
', 'Step 6: Spread about 1/2 teaspoon of the raspberry jam over the hazelnut spread.
', 'Step 7: Brush the edges with egg, and fold over the other side to enclose the filling.
', 'Step 8: Press the edges firmly to seal.
', 'Step 9: Repeat with the remaining rectangles.
', 'Step 10: Use a sharp knife to cut 5 slits across the top of each pastry, and place them on baking sheets, spacing 2 inches apart.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 18 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 12: Cool on racks.
', "Step 13: Dust with confectioners' sugar when cooled if desired.
"]

Title: Patti's Mussels a la Mariniere
Ingredients: ['50 fresh mussels, scrubbed and debearded', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup white wine', '2 tablespoons margarine or butter', '3 green onions, chopped', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '3 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place mussels in a large bowl with cold water to cover.
', 'Step 2: Let them soak for about 20 minutes to remove any dirt or sand.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic, and saute for one minute, but do not brown.
', 'Step 5: Add the chopped green onion and tomatoes, and cook until almost tender.
', 'Step 6: Pour in the white wine, and stir in the parsley and butter.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a boil, and allow to boil until the liquid has reduced by half, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 9: Add the mussels to the pot, cover and allow to cook until the shells are opened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Transfer the mussels and sauce to a large serving bowl, discarding any unopened shells.
', 'Step 11: Bon appetit!
']

Title: Galette des Rois
Ingredients: ['¼ cup almond paste', '¼ cup white sugar', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened', '1 egg', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 pinch salt', '1 (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 dry kidney bean', '1 egg, beaten', "1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the almond paste into a food processor or blender with about half of the sugar, and process until well blended.
', 'Step 2: Add the butter and remaining sugar using and process until smooth, then blend in 1 egg, vanilla extract, almond extract, flour and salt.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Butter a baking sheet or line with parchment paper, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Roll out one sheet of the puff pastry into an 11-inch square.
', 'Step 7: Keep the pastry cool, do not knead or stretch.
', 'Step 8: Use a large pie plate, cake pan or frying pan to trace an 11 inch circle onto the dough using the tip of a small knife.
', 'Step 9: Place the circle of pastry onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with the second sheet of pastry.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate both sheets.
', 'Step 12: Mound the almond filling onto the center of the pastry that is on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 13: Leave about 1 1/2 inch margin at the edges.
', 'Step 14: Press the bean or feve down into the filling.
', 'Step 15: Place the second sheet of pastry on top, and press down the edges to seal.
', 'Step 16: Beat the remaining egg with a fork, and lightly brush onto the top of the galette.
', 'Step 17: Use a knife to make a crisscross pattern in the egg wash, and then prick several small slits in the top to vent steam while baking.
', 'Step 18: Bake for 15 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 19: Do not open the oven until the time is up, as the pastry will not fully puff.
', "Step 20: Remove from the oven, and dust with confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 21: Return to the oven, and cook for an additional 12 to 15 minutes, or until the top is a deep golden brown.
', 'Step 22: Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
', 'Step 23: Lay a golden paper crown gently on top of the cake.
', 'Step 24: This will be used to crown the person who finds the bean or feve.
', 'Step 25: Serve warm or cold.
', 'Step 26: Make sure to tell everyone about the bean or feve.
']

Title: Apple Clafoutis
Ingredients: ['4 large eggs', '¾ cup brown sugar', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '5 tablespoons salted butter', '⅓ cup brown sugar', '¼ cup water', '6 cups apples, peeled and sliced into 1/2-inch wedges', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix eggs and brown sugar in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Whisk in flour and salt.
', 'Step 4: Slowly add milk, stirring constantly until well combined.
', 'Step 5: Stir in vanilla extract and set aside to rest.
', 'Step 6: Melt butter, brown sugar, and water in a 10 1/4-inch cast iron skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Stir frequently until mixture starts to boil.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to medium; swirl skillet, but do not stir, until mixture starts to thicken, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add apples and cinnamon.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir until apples are crisp-tender and starting to brown, 15 to 18 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 12: Stir egg mixture and pour over the apples in the skillet.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown and custard is set, 28 to 35 minutes.
']

Title: Vanilla-Almond Spiced French Toast
Ingredients: ['2 cups whole milk', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '4 large eggs', "1 teaspoon double-strength imitation vanilla extract (such as Goodman's Route 66)", '½ teaspoon almond extract (such as Watkins® pure almond extract)', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '⅛ teaspoon ground allspice', '8 thick slices slightly stale Texas toast']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix whole milk and brown sugar in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Beat eggs, vanilla extract, almond extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice together in a separate bowl until the eggs are well beaten; add to the milk mixture and stir to dissolve the brown sugar.
', 'Step 3: Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 4: Set one slice of Texas toast into the milk mixture; let soak until moistened, about 10 seconds per side.
', 'Step 5: Cook the dipped toast in the preheated skillet until bottom is golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes; flip toast and continue to cook until the other side is browned, 3 to 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Repeat dipping and cooking with remaining bread slices.
']

Title: Wintertime French Style Split Pea Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, coarsely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon herbes de Provence', '1 ½ teaspoons ground turmeric', '2 large bay leaves', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pound dried split peas, rinsed', '¾ pound carrots, cut into bite-size chunks', '2 pounds new potatoes, cut into bite-size chunks', '1 (32 fluid ounce) container vegetable stock', '3 cups water', '1 ½ cups chopped lean cooked ham']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a heavy soup pot or Dutch oven; cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot oil until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir herbes de Provence, turmeric, bay leaves, and cayenne pepper into the vegetables; cook and stir until fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix dried split peas, half the carrots, half the potatoes, vegetable stock, and water into vegetables and seasonings, bring to a bowl, and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 4: Cover pot and simmer until peas are nearly tender, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir remaining half of carrots and potatoes and the ham into soup, cover, and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 25 more minutes.
']

Title: Tourtiere (French Pork Pie)
Ingredients: ['2 ½ pounds lean ground pork', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '1 bay leaf', '3 cups water', '4 baking potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 (15 ounce) packages refrigerated pie crusts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large saucepan, mix together the ground pork, cloves, cinnamon, onion, salt, celery, bay leaf and water.
', 'Step 2: The water will help break up the raw pork.
', 'Step 3: Simmer over medium-low heat for about 3 hours, or until the water has evaporated.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the heat and discard the bay leaf.
', 'Step 5: Towards the end of the pork cooking time, place the potatoes into a separate saucepan and fill with enough water to cover.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain and mash potatoes.
', 'Step 8: When the pork is done, stir the mashed potatoes into that pan until evenly blended.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Line two 9 inch pie plates with bottom crusts.
', 'Step 11: Spoon equal amounts of the pork filling into each crust.
', 'Step 12: Cover with top crusts and flute the edges to seal.
', 'Step 13: Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven, or until crust is golden brown.
']

Title: French-Style Apple Rhubarb Cake
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups white sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '1 ⅔ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups diced rhubarb', '1 apple, thinly sliced', '⅓ cup sliced almonds, or to taste', '1 pinch white sugar, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9-inch round pan.
', 'Step 3: Beat 1 1/4 cups sugar and butter together using an electric mixer until well blended, light, and fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Add eggs, one at a time, followed by vanilla extract, mixing well after each addition.
', 'Step 5: Turn mixer to low speed and slowly add in flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing just until combined.
', 'Step 6: Fold in rhubarb.
', 'Step 7: Pour batter into the prepared baking pan.
', 'Step 8: Smooth the top and place apple slices in a circular pattern on batter.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle almonds and additional sugar on top.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 35 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Let cool, and serve warm or cold.
']

Title: French Onion Soup with Homemade Beef Stock
Ingredients: ['12 cups water', '1 pound beef short ribs', '3 parsnips, peeled and cubed', '3 onions, coarsely chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and coarsely chopped', '2 stalks celery with leaves, coarsely chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme', '¼ cup butter', '4 large onions, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, smashed', '¼ cup flour, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon herbes de Provence', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, or to taste', '¼ cup dry white wine', '2 tablespoons dry sherry', '1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste', '4 thick slices French bread', 'basil and garlic-flavored olive oil for brushing', '2 cups grated Gruyere cheese', '1 pinch sea salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the water, beef ribs, parsnips, onions, carrots, celery, bay leaves, 1 teaspoon of salt, 1 teaspoon of black pepper, and 1 tablespoon of fresh thyme into a large soup pot over medium heat, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to a simmer, and cook, skimming and discarding the foam that forms on the top of the broth, until the broth is a rich brown color, 5 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 3: Broth may be made in a slow cooker.
', 'Step 4: Strain the broth, discard the ribs and vegetables, and refrigerate extra broth.
', 'Step 5: Melt butter in a large heavy skillet or cast iron pan over medium-low heat, and cook the onions and garlic until caramelized and brown, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mix flour, herbes de Provence, paprika, and garlic powder together in a bowl, and sprinkle the flour mixture over the browned onions.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir 5 minutes; add salt and black pepper to taste, and mix in parsley and 1 more teaspoon of thyme.
', 'Step 8: Pour in 4 cups of beef broth, white wine, sherry, and hot pepper sauce; simmer until the flavors have blended and the soup has thickened, at least 15 minutes.
', "Step 9: More time couldn't hurt.
", "Step 10: About 15 minutes before serving time, preheat oven's broiler, and place a rack about 6 inches from the heat source.
", 'Step 11: Brush the slices of French bread with flavored olive oil, and toast under the preheated broiler until well browned on each side, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 12: Ladle soup into ovenproof soup bowls, and place a toasted bread slice on top of each bowl.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle each bread slice evenly with Gruyere cheese.
', 'Step 14: Place the filled soup bowls under the broiler until the cheese is melted, bubbly, and browned, 2 to 4 minutes or as needed.
']

Title: Vanilla or Chocolate Tuiles
Ingredients: ['½ cup unsalted butter, room temperature', "1 cup confectioners' sugar, sifted", '4 egg whites', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup cake flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat butter and sugar together with an electric mixer on medium-high speed.
', 'Step 2: Beat in the egg whites, one at a time.
', 'Step 3: Beat in the vanilla.
', "Step 4: Lower the speed and add the flour or flour-cocoa mixture (see Cook's Note) and mix until just combined.
", 'Step 5: Do not overmix.
', 'Step 6: Cover bowl and chill for at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Cut a small hole (about 3 1/2 inch diameter) in a thin piece of cardboard or plastic to serve as a template in forming the tuiles.
', 'Step 9: Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper or a silicon mat and place the stencil on it.
', 'Step 10: Using a small off-set spatula, place a small amount of the batter in the center of the hole of the stencil and spread it out evenly.
', 'Step 11: Carefully lift the stencil off.
', 'Step 12: Repeat for more cookies.
', 'Step 13: Bake in preheated oven until lightly brown around the edges, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven and while still hot, remove tuiles from the pan and drape them over a rolling pin.
', 'Step 15: Allow to sit a few minutes to harden and cool.
', 'Step 16: Store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Beef Short Rib French Onion Soup
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons salt', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '8 meaty beef short ribs', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup butter', '8 sweet onions (such as Vidalia®), sliced and separated into rings', '2 quarts beef broth', '½ cup sherry', '12 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, thinly sliced', '2 cups shredded Gruyere cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour, 2 tablespoons salt, 1 tablespoon black pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and onion powder in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Dredge beef short ribs in the seasoned flour mixture.
', 'Step 3: Reserve 3 tablespoons of leftover seasoned flour.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat and pan-fry the beef ribs until browned on all sides, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Remove ribs and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Turn heat down to medium and melt butter in the pot; cook and stir sweet onions in the butter until soft and slightly browned, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir constantly and reduce heat if onions begin to burn.
', 'Step 8: Stir 3 tablespoons of reserved seasoned flour mixture into the onions and cook and stir for 10 minutes; pour in beef broth and sherry.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until soup is slightly thickened; season with more salt and black pepper, if desired.
', 'Step 10: Strip leaves from thyme sprigs and add leaves to the soup.
', 'Step 11: Gently return short ribs to the pot, reduce heat to low, and simmer soup until ribs are tender, about 2 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 12: Stir soup every hour or so.
', "Step 13: Preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 14: Ladle soup into oven-safe soup crocks, placing a short rib into each bowl.
', 'Step 15: Top soup with 2 slices of French bread per bowl and sprinkle about 1/4 cup of Gruyere cheese over each crock.
', 'Step 16: Place crocks under broiler until cheese is browned and bubbling, 2 to 3 minutes.
']

Title: Clafoutis aux Cerises (Classic Clafouti)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups milk', '½ vanilla bean, split', '1 teaspoon unsalted butter', '4 cups cherries (with pits)', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '3 tablespoons heavy cream', '2 tablespoons white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine milk and vanilla bean in a pot and steep for at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: Grease an 8-inch baking dish with butter.
', 'Step 4: Spread out cherries in the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Combine 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 cup sugar and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Add eggs one at a time; beat with an electric mixer after each addition until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 7: Remove vanilla bean from milk and discard.
', 'Step 8: Add milk to egg mixture.
', 'Step 9: Pour in heavy cream; mix until smooth.
', 'Step 10: Pour mixture evenly over cherries.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until top of clafoutis is golden, 45 to 50 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove from the oven and sprinkle 2 tablespoons sugar on top.
', 'Step 13: Let cool slightly before serving so that the clafoutis is set.
', 'Step 14: Serve warm or at room temperature.
']

Title: French Pastry Pie Crust
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '1 cup shortening', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar', '5 tablespoons water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, salt, and sugar.
', 'Step 2: Mix well, then cut in shortening until mixture resembles coarse meal.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, combine egg, vinegar, and 4 tablespoons of water.
', 'Step 4: Whisk together, then add gradually to flour mixture, stirring with a fork.
', 'Step 5: Mix until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 6: Add one more tablespoon of water if necessary.
', 'Step 7: Allow dough to rest in refrigerator 10 minutes before rolling out.
']

Title: French Apple Tart (Tarte de Pommes a la Normande)
Ingredients: ['1 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup butter, softened', '1 egg yolk', '3 tablespoons cold water, or as needed', '½ cup butter, softened', '½ cup white sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon apple brandy', '⅔ cup ground almonds', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '4 medium sweet apples - peeled, cored, halved and thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon white sugar for decoration', '¼ cup apricot jelly']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, stir together 1 1/3 cups of flour and salt.
', 'Step 2: Add the butter, 1 egg yolk and water, and stir until the mixture forms large crumbs.
', 'Step 3: If it is too dry to press a handful together, stir in more water.
', 'Step 4: Press the dough into a ball, and wrap in plastic wrap.
', 'Step 5: Flatten slightly, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or until firm.
', 'Step 6: This part can be done up to three days in advance.
', 'Step 7: To make the frangipane, cream together the butter and 1/2 cup of sugar in a medium bowl until light and soft.
', 'Step 8: Gradually mix in the egg and the remaining egg yolk one at a time.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the apple brandy.
', 'Step 10: Stir 2 tablespoons of flour into the ground almonds, then mix into the batter.
', 'Step 11: Set aside.
', 'Step 12: Roll the pastry dough out to about a 12 inch circle on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 13: Fold loosely into quarters, and center the point in a 10 inch tart or pie pan.
', 'Step 14: Unfold dough, and press into the bottom and up the sides.
', 'Step 15: Prick with a fork all over, and flute the edges.
', 'Step 16: Return pastry to the refrigerator to chill until firm.
', 'Step 17: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Place a baking sheet inside the oven while it preheats.
', 'Step 19: Spoon the frangipane into the chilled pastry, and spread into an even layer.
', 'Step 20: Arrange the apple slices in an overlapping spiral pattern.
', 'Step 21: Each slice should have one edge pressed into the frangipane until it touches the pastry base, and then overlap the previous slice.
', 'Step 22: Start at the outside edge, and work towards the center.
', 'Step 23: Place the pie plate on top of the baking sheet in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 24: Bake for 15 minutes, or until the filling begins to brown.
', 'Step 25: Reduce the oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 26: Bake for another 10 minutes, then sprinkle sugar over the top of the tart.
', 'Step 27: Return to the oven for 10 more minutes, or until the sugar caramelizes slightly.
', 'Step 28: Cool the tart on a wire rack.
', 'Step 29: A short time before serving, warm the apricot jelly.
', 'Step 30: Add some water if necessary to make it a liquid consistency.
', 'Step 31: Brush onto the tart for a nice shine.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '506.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '50.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '135.5 mg', 'fatContent': '32.3 g', 'fiberContent': '4 g', 'proteinContent': '7.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '199.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '26.1 g'}

Title: Egg-White Crepes
Ingredients: ['½ cup whole wheat flour', '2 egg whites', '½ cup skim milk', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '½ cup mixed frozen berries, thawed and drained', "1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting"]

['Step 1: Whisk together the wheat flour, egg whites, milk, salt, and oil in a large bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Lightly coat a skillet with cooking spray and place over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Pour 1/4 cup of the batter into the skillet.
', 'Step 4: Tilt the pan in a circular motion to allow the batter to spread to the edges.
', 'Step 5: Cook until the bottom is light brown, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Flip the crepe and place 2 tablespoons of the mixed berries in the center of the crepe; cook another 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Fold the crepe in half and remove with a spatula to a serving plate.
', "Step 8: Dust with confectioners' sugar and serve.
"]

Title: Chicken Cordon Bleu Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 egg', '½ cup milk', '2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into chunks', '1 cup plain dried bread crumbs', '1 cup oil for frying', '8 ounces Swiss cheese, cubed', '8 ounces cubed ham', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup', '1 cup milk']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Beat egg and 1/2 cup milk together until combined.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the chicken chunks to coat, then drain, and coat with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a large skillet to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Fry breaded chicken cubes in hot oil until golden brown on all sides, then remove, and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 6: Place chicken cubes in a glass baking dish, along with the Swiss cheese, and ham.

Title: Chef John's Tomato Tart
Ingredients: ['1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed and cut into quarters', '2 ½ tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1 large ripe tomato, sliced into 1/4-inch rounds', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 pinches herbes de Provence', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 pinch chopped fresh oregano', '1 pinch chopped fresh parsley', '1 pinch chopped fresh thyme']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place 2 pieces of puff pastry onto a silicone-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Press the short seam of 1 piece onto the other to form the rectangular base of the tart.
', 'Step 4: Cut seams off the other 2 pieces of puff pastry and press them into the edges of the base to act as the border.
', 'Step 5: Freeze dough until firm, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Score border with a knife, making shallow cuts 1/4-inch apart.
', 'Step 7: Press the bottom of a fork onto the seam in the middle and poke holes all over the base.
', 'Step 8: Bake tart shell until lightly golden and partially puffed, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Press down on the base using the bottom of a fork.
', 'Step 10: Avoid pressing border.
', 'Step 11: Let cool for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Spread mustard over the inside of the tart.
', 'Step 13: Arrange tomato slices into a single layer on top and cut a few slices in half to fill in the gaps.
', 'Step 14: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 15: Generously sprinkle herbes de Provence on top.
', 'Step 16: Add Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and drizzle most of the olive oil on top.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until pastry is well browned and crispy, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Cool to room temperature on the baking sheet or transfer to a wire rack using 2 spatulas.
', 'Step 19: Drizzle remaining olive oil over the tart and sprinkle fresh oregano, parsley, and thyme on top.
']

Title: Simple and Easy Coq au Vin
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup milk', '2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 (8 ounce) package button mushrooms, sliced', '2 cups halved baby carrots', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cups red wine', '2 cups low-sodium chicken broth, or as needed', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Mix flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper together in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Pour milk into a separate bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dip chicken in the milk, allowing excess milk to drip back into bowl.
', 'Step 5: Dredge chicken through flour mixture until evenly coated.
', 'Step 6: Cook 1/2 of the chicken in the hot oil until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Remove chicken from pot and brown remaining chicken.
', 'Step 8: Return all the chicken to the pot.
', 'Step 9: Mix mushrooms, carrots, and onion into chicken, stirring gently to distribute vegetables among the chicken.
', 'Step 10: Pour wine over chicken and vegetables, stirring with a wooden spoon to scrape up any browned bits from bottom of pot.
', 'Step 11: Add enough chicken broth to nearly cover the chicken and vegetables.
', 'Step 12: Stir Italian seasoning, rosemary, salt, and pepper into broth mixture; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Cover pot, reduce heat to low, and simmer, stirring occasionally, until chicken is cooked through, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 14: Remove lid and turn heat up to medium-high; boil, stirring occasionally, until sauce is reduced and thickened, about 15 minutes.
']

Title: Orange Citrus Vinaigrette

Title: Chocolate Yule Log
Ingredients: ['1 ⅔ cups powdered sugar', '½ cup butter, at room temperature', '1 ½ tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 pinch salt', '2 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur', '⅓ cup mascarpone cheese', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '5 large eggs, at room temperature', '⅔ cup white sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla', '2 tablespoons powdered sugar, or as needed', '1 cup heavy cream, boiling-hot', '1 (8 ounce) package dark chocolate chips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whip powdered sugar, butter, cocoa powder, salt, and coffee liqueur together in the bowl of a stand mixer on high speed.
', 'Step 2: Transfer buttercream into a separate bowl and add mascarpone cheese.
', 'Step 3: Mix until combined; set aside.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Brush a little melted butter over a 13x18-inch rimmed sheet pan.
', 'Step 6: Line pan with parchment paper and brush remaining melted butter on top.
', 'Step 7: Combine cocoa powder, salt, and flour together in a bowl; whisk or sift to break up clumps.
', 'Step 8: Place eggs in the clean bowl of your stand mixer.
', 'Step 9: Add sugar and whip until fluffy, thick, and very light in color.
', 'Step 10: Add 1/2 of the cocoa powder mixture and vanilla extract; mix on low speed for a few seconds.
', 'Step 11: Beat in remaining cocoa mixture on low for a few seconds.
', 'Step 12: Switch to high speed; stop once mixture is moistened but not fully blended.
', 'Step 13: Pull off the whisk attachment and whisk batter with it until evenly blended.
', 'Step 14: Pour batter onto the prepared sheet pan and spread out with a spatula, leaving some room around the edges.
', 'Step 15: Tap pan on the counter to knock out the large bubbles.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until top is dry and edges start to pull away from the sides, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Dust a clean kitchen towel with enough powdered sugar to cover an area slightly larger than the sponge cake.
', 'Step 18: Remove cake from the oven.
', 'Step 19: Run a knife around the edges of the pan.
', 'Step 20: Sprinkle some powdered sugar over the top.
', "Step 21: Run a spatula under the parchment paper to make sure it's not stuck to the pan.
", 'Step 22: Quickly flip pan on top of the sugared area to invert the cake.
', 'Step 23: Remove parchment paper and dust cake with more powdered sugar.
', 'Step 24: Gently roll cake up inside the towel; allow to cool for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Unroll cake and dollop buttercream on top, reserving some for later.
', 'Step 26: Spread frosting to the edges.
', 'Step 27: Roll cake up over the frosting, using the towel to lift it if needed.
', 'Step 28: Sprinkle more powdered sugar on top.
', 'Step 29: Wrap log in plastic wrap.
', 'Step 30: Refrigerate until firm, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 31: Combine chocolate chips and hot cream in a bowl.
', 'Step 32: Let sit for 1 minute.
', 'Step 33: Whisk until chocolate melts.
', 'Step 34: Make an angled cut 3 inches from one end of the log.
', 'Step 35: Place log on a parchment-lined sheet pan.
', 'Step 36: Apply some buttercream to the angled slice and attach it to one side.
', 'Step 37: Spread a layer of ganache all over the cake, except for the swirls.
', 'Step 38: Refrigerate for 15 minutes to firm up ganache.
', 'Step 39: Carve lines into the ganache using the tip of a knife to create the appearance of tree bark.
', 'Step 40: Refrigerate until completely chilled before serving.
', 'Step 41: Dust with cocoa powder and powdered sugar.
']

', 'Step 5: Place one slice of bread into the skillet and top with 2 slices of ham.

Title: Madeleines II
Ingredients: ['2 eggs', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '¾ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '½ cup butter, melted and cooled']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour twenty-four 3-inch Madeleine molds.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl beat eggs, vanilla and lemon zest with an electric mixer on high speed for 5 minutes.
', "Step 4: Gradually beat in the confectioners' sugar.

', 'Step 6: Sift together the flour and baking powder.
', 'Step 7: Sift one-fourth of the flour mixture over the egg mixture, gently fold in.
', 'Step 8: Fold in the remaining flour by fourths.
', 'Step 9: Then fold in the melted and cooled butter.

', 'Step 13: Loosen cookies with a knife.
', 'Step 14: Invert cookies onto a rack and cool.
', "Step 15: Sift confectioners' sugar over the tops or melt semi-sweet chocolate chips and dip the tips in the chocolate.
", 'Step 16: Store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Shrimp Provencal
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ pounds large shrimp (21-25 per pound), peeled and deveined', '2 cups red peppers, diced', '1 cup chopped onion', '3 large cloves garlic, chopped', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 (14.5 ounce) can canned diced tomatoes', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Quickly saute shrimp until they turn pink, but are not cooked through; remove from skillet and set aside.

']

Title: Cream Puffs II
Ingredients: ['1 cup water', '½ cup butter', '1 cup sifted all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt', '4 eggs', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup semisweet chocolate chips']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In medium saucepan, bring water to a boil.

', 'Step 4: Add flour and salt all at once and stir vigorously until mixture forms a ball.

', 'Step 16: Serve immediately.

Title: Filet Mignons With Pepper Cream Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup coarsely crushed black peppercorns', '4 (6 ounce) 1 1/2 inch thick filet mignon steaks', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '⅓ cup beef broth', '1 cup heavy cream']

['Step 1: Place the peppercorns into a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle the beef tenderloin filets with salt on both sides, and coat both sides with crushed peppercorns.
', 'Step 3: Melt the butter with the olive oil over high heat in a heavy skillet (not nonstick) until the foam disappears from the butter.

', 'Step 6: Remove the steaks to platter, and cover tightly with foil.
', 'Step 7: Pour the beef broth into the skillet, and use a whisk to stir the broth and scrape up any dissolved brown flavor bits from the skillet.

Title: French Country Bread
Ingredients: ['½ teaspoon active dry yeast', '1 cup warm water', '1 ½ cups bread flour', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 cups warm water', '1 cup whole wheat flour', '4 ½ cups bread flour, divided', '2 teaspoons salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: The night before baking the bread prepare this starter: In a medium sized non-metal mixing bowl dissolve 1/2 teaspoon active dry yeast in 1 cup warm water.
', 'Step 2: Add 1 1/2 cup bread flour and mix well.
', 'Step 3: Cover and let sit overnight at room temperature.
', 'Step 4: The next day: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve the 2 teaspoons yeast in the 2 cups warm water.
', 'Step 5: Add the starter mixture, the whole wheat flour, 3 cups bread flour and the salt; stir until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Add the remaining bread flour, 1/2 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
', 'Step 7: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 9: Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Grease two 9x5-inch loaf pans.
', 'Step 11: Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 12: Divide the dough into two equal pieces and form into loaves.
', 'Step 13: Place the loaves into the prepared pans.
', 'Step 14: Cover the loaves with a damp cloth and let rise until doubled in volume, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and the bottom of the loaf sounds hollow when tapped.
']

Title: Chef John's Creme Caramel

Title: New Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients: ['4 slices bacon', '1 (9 inch) frozen deep dish pie crust, thawed', '½ cup diced white onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cup half-and-half', '½ cup sour cream', '4 large eggs, beaten', '½ cup shredded Swiss cheese', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Title: Instant Pot® Provencal Honey-Lemon Chicken
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons herbes de Provence', '6 chicken legs', '4 chicken thighs', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 ½ cups chicken stock', '4 tablespoons honey', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '2 sprigs thyme, leaves picked', '1 tablespoon lavender flowers', '2 teaspoons cornstarch']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rub the herbes de Provence into the chicken legs and thighs.
', 'Step 2: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select the Saute function.
', 'Step 3: Add 2 tablespoons olive oil and sliced garlic.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken legs and thighs to the pot and brown on both sides, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken from pot and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Add chicken stock to the pot and place a rack inside.
', 'Step 7: Return chicken to the pot, on top of the rack.
', 'Step 8: Close and lock the lid; choose high pressure and set the timer for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 10: While chicken is cooking, prepare the sauce.
', 'Step 11: Whisk honey, lemon zest, lemon juice, thyme leaves, remaining oil, and lavender flowers together in a small bowl.
', "Step 12: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 13: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', "Step 14: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 15: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 16: Transfer chicken to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Brush sauce liberally over the chicken; reserve remaining sauce.
', 'Step 18: Broil chicken in the preheated oven until browned, about 2 minutes, watching carefully to prevent burning.
', 'Step 19: Pour remaining sauce into a small saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 20: Add one ladleful of liquid from the pressure cooker.
', 'Step 21: Whisk in cornstarch and boil until reduced by half or thickened to your preference, stirring frequently to prevent burning, 1 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Serve sauce alongside chicken.
']

Title: Poached Pears Belle Helene
Ingredients: ['6 cups water', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '4 Bosc pears - cored, peeled, stems left on', '1 vanilla bean', '3 cups sugar', '1 cup prepared hot fudge topping, or as needed', '1 cup vanilla ice cream, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place water in a heavy pot.
', 'Step 2: Stir in zest and juice of 1 lemon.
', 'Step 3: Place pears in pot.
', 'Step 4: Split the vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape out the seeds.

', 'Step 6: Pour in sugar.

', 'Step 9: Pears need to stay submerged, so place a small plate over them in the pot to keep them under the liquid.

', 'Step 14: Cover and refrigerate until pears are thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight.

', 'Step 16: Heat hot fudge sauce in a saucepan over medium heat until warm.
', 'Step 17: Dip base of pear into the chocolate and spoon chocolate along the sides except for the top inch or so of the pear.
', 'Step 18: Place dipped pears in individual serving bowls with another generous spoonful of syrup and a small scoop of vanilla ice cream.
']
